page.title: 16PARISH HALL NEWTON ST CYRES.
page.content: The Parish Hall is used for many different activities including:- {PLAYGROUP * }Each Tuesday and TODDLER GROUP Thursday Playgroup {SUNDAY SCHOOL * }and Toddler Group BINGO meet there. { }The Afternoon Club {JUMBLE SALES * }is mainly for old DANCES people e.g. whist, PARTIES bingo refreshments. { * The Hall has been {DRAMA GROUP redecorated in the {YOUNG FARMERS * last year,had new W.I. {stage curtains and {AFTERNOON CLUB * now conforms to {SCHOOL CONCERTS the new fire {BROWNIES_CUBS * regulations. At 9.00a.m. the Hall is open and when there are dances or parties often stays open until 1.00a.m. A Committee makes the rules and organises lettings.
